H0.text: What name is given to the study of insects . Entomology

H1.text: What name is given to the study of insects . Insectology

H2.text: What name is given to the study of insects . Arthropodology

H3.text: What name is given to the study of insects . Bugology

A4.text: Entomology, from Ancient Greek ἔντομον (éntomon), meaning 'insect', and λόγος (lógos), meaning 'study', is the branch of zoology that focuses on insects.

A5.text: The field is also referred to as insectology in American English

A7.text: Making Entomologists: How Periodicals Shaped Scientific Communities in Nineteenth-Century Britain (U of Pittsburgh Press, 2022) online book review
